column2: "ARKS these days overlook the importance of introducing themselves to other people! Even if you're an introvert, it has its uses!"
"Getting to know each other is a vital first step. The ARKS Card lets two people understand one another without saying a single word!"
"Even as we speak, I can feel the specter of anxiety rearing its ugly head! You, go and edit it right now!"
"Edit what? Your ARKS Card, of course!"
"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket science. Go put my mind at ease, already!"

"About the ARKS Card:

The \"ARKS Card\" is a card that you can use to introduce yourself with things like your character names, hobbies, and so on.

You can make a card that's unique to you by filling out the free comments and setting a favorite Symbol Art."

"You can edit your card by selecting \"Edit ARKS Card\" from \"Title / ARKS Card\" on the main menu.

Select the section you want to edit, and enter your content."

"Other peoples' ARKS Cards can be viewed from the Friend List by selecting \"View ARKS Card\".

As a point of note, since the ARKS card can be viewed by your friends or by others, do not enter personal information such as phone numbers or addresses."
